headline: Boeing's Q4 Loss Wider Than Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: BA's Q4 reports a loss of $1.91 per share, revenues surge 57% and deliveries jump, helping cap a sharp full-year turnaround.

raw.headline: Boeing's Q4 Loss Wider Than Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: BA's Q4 reports a loss of $1.91 per share, revenues surge 57% and deliveries jump, helping cap a sharp full-year turnaround.

headline: RTX Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: RTX tops Q4 estimates as EPS hits $1.55 and revenues jump 12%, capping 2025 with $6.29 EPS and $88.6B in sales.

raw.headline: RTX Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: RTX tops Q4 estimates as EPS hits $1.55 and revenues jump 12%, capping 2025 with $6.29 EPS and $88.6B in sales.

headline: Record Organic Sales Aid Northrop's Q4 Earnings & Revenue Beat
summary: NOC beats fourth-quarter earnings and revenue estimates as sales jump 9.6% year over year and backlog rises to $95.68 billion, led by strength across all four segments.

raw.headline: Record Organic Sales Aid Northrop's Q4 Earnings & Revenue Beat
raw.summary: NOC beats fourth-quarter earnings and revenue estimates as sales jump 9.6% year over year and backlog rises to $95.68 billion, led by strength across all four segments.

headline: What Analyst Projections for Key Metrics Reveal About L3Harris (LHX) Q4 Earnings
summary: Get a deeper insight into the potential performance of L3Harris (LHX) for the quarter ended December 2025 by going beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining the estimates for some of its key metrics.

raw.headline: What Analyst Projections for Key Metrics Reveal About L3Harris (LHX) Q4 Earnings

headline: Is L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Still Appealing After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: Wondering if L3Harris Technologies is priced for opportunity or already reflects the story? This article walks through what the numbers are saying about its current value. The stock recently closed at US$354.20, with returns of 2.2% over 7 days, 19.4% over 30 days, 16.3% year to date, 62.4% over 1 year, 78.1% over 3 years, and 125.9% over 5 years. This performance gives useful context before looking at valuation. Recent coverage around L3Harris has focused on its position as a large US...
